name: The Mysterious Kidnapping Part 2
description:
You get called in to investigate an abandoned hospital of reports of screaming and suspicious noises, after you investigate the hospital from a while you hear a sound of in the distance and you decide to explore and before you know it you wake up in what appears to be a freezer room in a undisclosed location. After searching through a couple boxes you find a key moments before you freeze to death. You begin to explore the what seems to be a warehouse rigged with various torcher devices. You locate a key in one of the toilets which leads to the main control room with cameras pointing at every room in the establishment  you find a key in one of the coat which is labelled exit.

(In freezer room lock door to your south)

(in the 5th section of the corridor there is a locked door to your north)
